Text:
Sorry folks, I should have given some more info.

This 7zip file contains an ISO image for Microsoft Office 2003 Professional cd1 which includes Word, Access, Excel, Powerpoint and Outlook 2003 updated with Office 2003 Service Pack 2.

Use 7zip file manager found at 

w w w .7-zip.org

in order to unzip the contents of the file.
plz post screenshot of this office
